name: ModelLoad
description: Loads an existing, pre-traind neural network model from a checkpoint.

inputParameters.name: model_type
inputParameters.description: Type of the autoencoder model. Options are: 'CAE' (conditional Autoencoder) and 'CVAE' (conditional Variational Autoencoder). Default: 'CAE'.

inputParameters.name: checkpoint_name
inputParameters.description: Name of the checkpoint file to load the model from, without the file extension. The file's extension must be .ckpt

inputParameters.name: checkpoint_path
inputParameters.description: Path to the directory containing the checkpoint file.

inputParameters.name: load
inputParameters.description: Set to True to load the model.

outputParameters.name: msg
outputParameters.description: Confirmation of the model loading, or an error message.
